description:
Kafeto is a member of http://anidb.net/ch86428 [The Octobrist Organization], a group of magicians dedicated to fighting against the http://anidb.net/ch81510 [Black King] and his forces. He is often seen assisting http://anidb.net/ch80626 [Abe no Haruakira] in one way or another. His codename is Ham.
Source: Drifters Wiki, edited.
name: Kafeto
